subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description:
Under the Grant Making mandate, a new Call for Proposals was published on support to the implementation of the new Constitution. A total of 69 CSOs have been identified to receive Core grants (16 CSOs) and project grants (53 CSOs) to intervene in areas of Access to Justice, Devolution and Human Rights. The Grants Assessment Report that was approved by the Projects Approval Committee is attached.

Capacity Building activities in the form of trainings in technical skills are also planned.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: 2KEN08215 AMKENI WAKENYA
